description.narrative: Models of inclusive ECE services (equal accessibility and quality education) as well as integrated ECI policies (timely multidisciplinary and multisector intervention) are identified established, tested, documented and validated.

sector.narrative: Multisector aid for basic social services
Provision of (formal and non-formal) early-learning / pre-primary education (including in temporary learning spaces)

description.narrative: Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

title.narrative: Croatia Programme Strategy Note Theory of Change (Early Childhood Development)
UNICEF Programmes in Croatia (Disaster Risk Reduction)
UNICEF Programmes in Croatia (Helping Child Regugees and Migrants)
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Models of inclusive ECE services (equal accessibility and quality education) as well as integrated ECI policies (timely multidisciplinary and multisector intervention) are identified established, tested, documented and validated.

description.narrative: A Train the Trainers Manual for Inclusive Education has been developed and shared with five Croatian universities, to enhance capacities of kindergarten professionals for inclusion. The Medjimurje county has been selected to model inclusive ECE. The collection of baseline data, mapping of the existing services and the assessment of individual and institutional capacities for conducting early detection and diagnosis of ASD have been completed. The piloting of a national framework for early screening, diagnosis and interventions in children with autism in Osijek-Baranja County has been initiated but due to resistance of primary health care sector, the progress has been constrained | Status:On-track | As-of Date:24/08/2020

target.value: 2020:Integrated Model of ECI services for at risk and Roma families defined in at least one county

actual.value: 2020:Under an EU funded Child Guarantee (CG) programme Medimurje County has been identified as a pilot site for modelling an Early childhood intervention service. Start date of the CG Programme 29th of July 2020

title.narrative: Existence of a Train the Trainers Curriculum for Educational inclusion for Trainers of University staff teaching future kindergarten and preschool teachers

actual.value: 2020:Train the Teachers curriculum developed and evaluated. Implementation and testing moved from June to September due to COVID-19

title.narrative: Availability of inclusive ECE model on county level

actual.value: 2020:indicator linked to Child Guarantee Programme which started in August 2020
